function.name: is_registered_student
function.description: Checks if a particular student identifier belongs to a registered student. Returns True if successful and False otherwise

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

function.name: get_student_submissions
function.description: Retrieves a list of exams submitted by the student for grading

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

function.name: get_student_submissions_by_date
function.description: Retrieves a list of exams submitted by the student for grading on a specific date

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

exam_date.description: The date the exam was taken in YYYY-MM-DD format

function.name: get_student_submissions_by_exam_id
function.description: Retrieves a list of exams submitted by the student for grading using the exam identifiers

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

exam_id.description: Uniquely identifies the exam taken by the student

function.name: get_submission_details
function.description: Retrieves details about a specific exam submitted by the student

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

submission_id.description: The submission identifier uniquely identifying the exam submitted by the student

function.name: get_student_grades
function.description: Retrieves the grades and summaries for all exam submissions from a specific student id

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

function.name: get_submission_grade_details
function.description: Retrieves the details and grades about a specific exam submission

student_id.description: A 7-digit number that uniquely identifies a student

submission_id.description: The submission identifier uniquely identifying the exam submitted by the student
